Articles.Content:
hi, I love KSP and I love physic. so this is for me one of the best games.

Happy lunching!

Welcome to the forums and yes definitely happy launching!

JGJiscool - all your big red button pressing needs
I'm just curious. How many people does realy know where is Slovenia? (NO MAP! AND NO OTHER CHEATING!)

I'm just curious. How many people does realy know where is Slovenia? (NO MAP! AND NO OTHER CHEATING!)

It's near Slovakia. Next to Croatia?
I don't know, but the people there are polite enough to introduce themselves!

Next to Italy, Austria, Croatia and Hungary.

Sorry for being inpolite.

What are these things? 'I-telly' and 'Crow-at-Ia' and 'Hungry'? Isn't 'Hungry' somewhere near Fiji?

P.s. I apologize if I implied you were being impolite. You weren't. But if you were then you were polite enough to apologize!

What are these things? 'I-telly' and 'Crow-at-Ia' and 'Hungry'? Isn't 'Hungry' somewhere near Fiji?

P.s. I apologize if I implied you were being impolite. You weren't. But if you were then you were polite enough to apologize!

That things are neighboring countries to Slovenia. Different speling but OK.

I\'m just curious. How many people does realy know where is Slovenia? (NO MAP! AND NO OTHER CHEATING!)

Hey, I know that!

I\'m from Croatia! ;D

Now, how many people know where Croatia is? ;P

I know.

But then, I cheat, I\'m in one of your neighboring countries. In other words, herzlich willkommen!

(And yes, I even know where Croatia is. Beautiful country and an even more beautiful coast. Wish we had one. *sniff*)
I\'ll trade you our beautiful coast for your Austrian discipline. We need it.
Disci... disci... what is that word you\'re talking about? I tried to find it in our dictionary but it doesn\'t exist, could you explain what it means?
